name: Cambridge Area Python Course
body:
### Welcome to the course webpage
This pages gives you some background on the course presenters and provides links to the course materials and example solutions to the exercises.

### Course materials
The course materials are available as [IPython notebook](http://ipython.org/notebook.html) files, one for each session of the course. IPython notebooks allow you to interactively run the example code. If you [install IPython](http://ipython.org/install.html) you can then run the notebooks locally and experiment with the code.

Static renderings of the notebooks are also available:



### Presenters
- Tim Stevens, Babraham Institute
- Graham Ritchie, EBI & Sanger Institute
- Gabor Bunkoczi, CIMR, University of Cambridge
- James Morris, Sanger Institute
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
